page.title: 13Education
page.content: At the end of their primary education the pupils of the five primary schools in our area mostly go to the 2 local secondary schools which receive pupils at 11 years.Others choose to attend comprehensive schools which are not in our immediate area.The 2 secondary schools are single sex:Northfleet Boys School enrolled 204 pupils from local primary schools and 3 others came from outside Kent.Northfleet Girls School enrolled 183 from local primary schools and 1 pupil came from outside our immediate area.Northfleet Grammar School is a mixed upper school which receives pupils selected by merit and parental decision at 13 years and 6th formers at 16 years.This school received 23 pupils into the 6th form and 74 pupils aged 13_14 years.13 of these came from Northfleet Boys and 12 from Northfleet Girls School.
